Welcome!

Yeah, I have no idea what I'm doing

Just keep on reading, maybe you'll find something interesting.

About Me

My name is Kalle Diop Niang, AKA kallzo... I like fried chicken, but who doesn't...

I'm a self-taught programmer. Because, why not. I love programming, and computers, and anything related to tech...

I just turned 27, (actually that was last year, now I'm 28) and I remembered that when I was a kid, probably around 2, I said to myself "I'm gonna make a really ugly website when I turn 27".

That's not actually true, I don't even remember where I was, or what I was doing when I was 2.

So, if you remember something about yourself when you were 2, feel free to tell me. Unless you're actually a 2 year old, then you might wanna tell me how is it that you can use the internet and type things.

You might be wondering "What the heck is this?" Well, I've been wondering the same thing...

So, this is just a simple project, I think it's supposed to be about me, but even I don't know what I'm about...

Does it look ugly? Yes, but I'm also ugly, so it makes sense.

It didn't take me long to make this at all, and there are no frameworks involved...

Just pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Who knows, maybe I'll work on it and make it look prettier... I doubt that'll happen though.

Feel free to contact me...

Well, this looks terrible... Any ideas?

You know, Maybe I need a little bit of inspiration.

But before inspiration comes, let's just try and focus on the bright side of things, like how beautiful this page looks. I mean, have you ever seen anything like it? This is a masterpiece design.

So if you need someone to fix you up something like this, just hit me up, I'll be glad to cover your entire life with some style.

Did I tell you where I live? No I didn't... Peace
